mapper.insert: insert into product_orders( order_no, user_id, seller_id, total_amount, delivery_address, contact_name, contact_phone, order_status, remark, create_time, update_time ) values( #{orderNo}, #{userId}, #{sellerId}, #{totalAmount}, #{deliveryAddress}, #{contactName}, #{contactPhone}, #{orderStatus}, #{remark}, now(), now() )
mapper.update: update product_orders set order_status = #{orderStatus}, cancel_reason = #{cancelReason}, update_time = now() where order_no = #{orderNo}
update product_orders set order_status = 2, pay_time = now(), update_time = now() where order_no = #{orderNo} and order_status = 1
update product_orders set order_status = 3, ship_time = now(), update_time = now() where order_no = #{orderNo} and order_status = 2
update product_orders set order_status = 4, confirm_time = now(), update_time = now() where order_no = #{orderNo} and order_status = 3
